name: Debug Transition
helpText:
Debug Transition

This component allows you to set a debug breakpoint on the data as it moves from one component to the next.

NOTE: debug elements are not saved when the project is closed.

componentName.helpText: For a debug element, this will be the name of the component into which the debug flows.

configurable.helpText: This property reflects that a component has the necessary configuration setup so that it can be edited in the blue console. Its is more of a status and as such is not explicitly used.
